targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "pd_rate" WHERE "disk_index" = '$disk_index' AND "fqdn" = '$fqdn' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "controller", "type", "fqdn"

panels.title: I/O Performance on Physical Disk "$disk_index" of SFA "$fqdn"

targets.query: SELECT "value" / $BARRELEYE_COLLECT_INTERVAL FROM "pd_rate" WHERE "fqdn" = '$fqdn' AND "disk_index" = '$disk_index' AND "type" = 'iops' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "controller"

panels.title: IOPS on Physical Disk "$disk_index" of SFA "$fqdn"

targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "vd_rate" WHERE "fqdn" = 'OST' AND "disk_index" = '$disk_index' AND "type" = 'KiBps' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "controller"
